lead_paragraph: The pre-season Manchester derby that would have pitted City's new manager Pep Guardiola against his United counterpart Jose Mourinho has been cancelled hours before Monday's encounter due to weather concerns in Beijing.

headline.print_headline: China Manchester Derby Abandoned Due to Weather Concerns
headline.main: China Manchester Derby Abandoned Due to Weather Concerns
